header.title: Enterprise scale security, and governance
header.subtitle: From startups to enterprises, businesses are improving operations and increasing efficiency by building custom apps on Appsmith.

features.title: Self-hosting with air-gapped deployment options
features.description: Run any edition of Appsmith in your infrastructure.

features.title: Embeddable within existing apps with shared logins
features.description: Extend the functionality of your legacy and SaaS applications.

features.title: Open source under Apache 2.0 license
features.description: Build with high transparency and low vendor risk.

features.title: SAML and OIDC SSO
features.description: Secure authentication and authorization with your login provider.

features.title: Role-based access controls
features.description: Customize granular roles, groups, and permissions.

features.title: SCIM-based user provisioning
features.description: Import users and roles from your IdP.

features.title: Audit logging
features.description: Track organizational use and remediate issues.

features.title: Award-winning support
features.description: Development and deployment assistance with rapid response SLAs.

footer.callToAction: Appsmith is lightweight, fast, and developer-focused. It’s easy to get started.
